title: UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette, Professional Flash Non Toxic Safe Tattoo Halloween FX Party Artist Fancy Makeup Painting Kit For Kids and Adult
descriptions:
Turn every face into a canvas and every party into a performance with the UCANBE Athena Face Body Paint Oil Palette. This professional-grade kit packs 20 intensely pigmented, creamy shades—featuring flash and Aqua tones like gold, silver, vibrant reds, blues, greens, and essential black and white—so you can create everything from ultra-glam festival looks to realistic SFX bruises, blood, and cosplay characters.

Why you’ll love it:
- Vivid, blendable color: High-coverage, color-saturated formula glides on smoothly and layers beautifully with sponge or brush.
- Comfortable and long-wearing: Oil-based, skin-friendly paints feel flexible, dry quickly, resist cracking, and stay smudge-proof with minimal rub-off.
- Built for creativity: Perfect for Halloween, stage performances, carnivals, birthday parties, campfires, theme nights, and pro artist kits.
- Safe for all: Non-toxic and gentle for both kids and adults on face and body.
- Easy clean-up: Removes easily with olive oil or a professional waterproof makeup remover.

Housed in a sturdy, convenient plastic case, the UCANBE Athena palette is your all-in-one toolkit for crowns, costumes, bruises, blood, and beyond. Create show-stopping looks that last through the night—and wipe away when the curtain falls.
